scripts.build:and: mkdir -p dist/android && rm -rf dist/android/* && react-native bundle --entry-file index.android.js --dev true --platform android --bundle-output dist/android/app.bundle --assets-dest dist/android/
scripts.build:ios: mkdir -p dist/ios && rm -rf dist/ios/* && react-native bundle --entry-file index.ios.js --dev true --platform ios --bundle-output dist/ios/app.bundle --assets-dest dist/ios/
